player_news.trend_summary: Kylian Mbappé is firing on all cylinders for Real Madrid, equalling a Cristiano Ronaldo record and scoring a brace against Leganes to save the team's season. However, UEFA is investigating Mbappé, along with other Real Madrid players, for conduct during a match against Atletico.
